name: HELI 100
description:
Get into your helicopter gunship and blast your way through flying alien armies in this action-packed shoot 'em up game!

FEATURES:
- Battle 100 stages against alien enemies
- Powerups help your fight!
- Unleash total destruction!
- Unlock powerful helicopters, planes and mechs
- Special endless attack stage for the true hardcore shmup fans!
- Compete on online leaderboards
- Unlock achievements

QUICK MANUAL:
* Use screen left and right sides to steer
* Hold both sides pressed to stop movement
* Collect powerup weapons and launch them by tapping buttons in bottom side of screen
* Destroy everything that moves
